TopicTitle: La Quarta - Supersonic research aircraft, 171 parts

Articles.Content:
Hi there, I'm Kristian. I have been here since 2011, but I seldom post anything.

This is the fourth plane I have constructed in my career save (hence "La Quarta", feminine form of "The fourth" in italian).

Not much to write about it, really. Have a look at the pictures and take her to the skies!

Oh, and you need Ven's Stock revamp. Since it's meant to be flown without SAS, you probably need Raster prop monitor in order to keep an eye on the trim levels.
